pages.text: The Vacuumulator is a device that can pick up items in its area of effect. It can pick up XP Orbs when a $(l:thermal:technology/augments/xp_storage)Knowledge Concentrator augment$(/l) is installed. At base, the Vacuumulator collects in a 9x9x9 area with an offset center. This can be improved using $(l:thermal:technology/augments/area_radius)Radial Enhancement augments$(/l).

pages.title: Vacuumulator
pages.text: When controlled via redstone signal, the Vacuumulator will immediately collect the moment it is turned on. This way, it will always reliably activate when pulsed.
